About Us
Homepage
/  About Us
Book Now
About Us
UNLOCK YOUR FULL POTENTIAL WITH US
We leverage cutting-edge artificial intelligence and computer vision technology to deliver real-time performance analysis for our students.
Our system meticulously monitors key elements of your swing, including movement patterns, technique, and physical metrics. With this data, we offer actionable insights to fine-tune your training, reduce the risk of injury, and elevate your performance using a science-backed, data-driven approach
WE CONVERT YOUR SWING VIDEO INTO 3D
WE PROVIDE 3D / 2D ANALYSIS
WE COMPARE TWO SWINGS WITH 3D MOTION DATA
LESSON WITH SCREEN RECORDINGS + VOICE- OVERS
About Us
Our Vision and Mission
Our Vision
To revolutionize golf training by providing cutting-edge, personalized instruction that empowers players to continuously improve through data-backed insights and advanced technology.
Our Mission
Our mission is to offer accessible, high-quality golf lessons that deliver deep, actionable insights to optimize training, reduce injuries, and ultimately improve performance.
Our Goals
Our goals are to provide golfers with personalized, data-driven insights to improve their performance and to make advanced, AI-powered coaching accessible to players everywhere.
FAQ
Popular Question
How do virtual golf lessons work?
Normal Icon
Active Icon
Our virtual golf lessons use AI and computer vision technology to analyze your swing. You’ll upload a video of your swing, and our system will provide a detailed analysis with personalized feedback and coaching.
.elementskit-card END
What technology do you use for analysis?
Normal Icon
Active Icon
We utilize artificial intelligence and computer vision to convert your swing into 3D motion data, allowing for precise analysis of movement patterns, technique, and physical metrics.
.elementskit-card END
Can I compare my swings over time?
Normal Icon
Active Icon
Yes! Our system allows you to compare two swings using 3D motion data, helping you track your progress and identify areas for improvement.
.elementskit-card END
What do I receive after each lesson?
Normal Icon
Active Icon
After each lesson, you’ll receive a 3D/2D swing analysis, a side-by-side comparison of your swings (if applicable), and a video recording of your session with voice-over feedback from our experts.
.elementskit-card END
Are the lessons live or pre-recorded?
Normal Icon
Active Icon
Our lessons are based on video submissions. You’ll upload your swing, and our instructors will analyze it and provide a detailed video response with actionable feedback.
.elementskit-card END
Do I need any special equipment for the lessons?
Normal Icon
Active Icon
You’ll only need a device capable of recording video (such as a smartphone) and access to our platform to upload your swing for analysis.
.elementskit-card END
Can beginners benefit from these lessons?
Normal Icon
Active Icon
Absolutely! Our AI-powered lessons cater to golfers of all skill levels, from beginners looking to learn the basics to advanced players refining their techniques.
.elementskit-card END
How quickly will I get feedback after submitting my swing video?
Normal Icon
Active Icon
Feedback is typically delivered within 24 to 48 hours, depending on the volume of submissions.
.elementskit-card END
How often should I take lessons?
Normal Icon
Active Icon
This depends on your goals and schedule. Many of our students take lessons weekly to monitor their progress, but you can take them at a pace that works best for you.
.elementskit-card END
Is there ongoing support after the lesson?
Normal Icon
Active Icon
Yes, our instructors are available for follow-up questions and additional guidance to ensure you stay on track with your golf improvement.
.elementskit-card END
Didnt’ find A Answer?

Membership Pricing

Contact Us
Here at
Florida Golf Studio
, we’re a community of people who are serious about getting better at golf. Becoming a member allows you to stay consistent with your golf practice and without breaking the bank. From practice/play memberships to lesson packages, there’s a membership option for every golfer, no matter their skill level. Check out our pricing below and contact us to sign up for a membership!
Member Benefits
Along with getting our best bay rates, Florida Golf Studio members enjoy:
30-day advance booking
Access to practice putting green with training aids
24-hour cancellation policy
15% off all merchandise (except clubs)
Book Now
Hourly Practice/Play Memberships
If you’re looking to drastically improve your golf game, you’re in the right spot. Our monthly memberships allow you to access our bays and
golf technology
when it’s convenient for you. Hours can always be added, and unused hours roll over to the next month.
2-Hour Monthly:  $76
Four 30-minute sessions to be used throughout the month.
($19.99/session)
Pay annually (24 hours/yr.) for $775
(save 15%)
3-Hour Monthly: $105
Six 30-minute sessions to be used throughout the month.
($19/session)
Pay annually (36 hours/yr.) for $1071
(save 15%)
4-Hour Monthly: $132
Eight 30-minute sessions to be used throughout the month.
($18/session)
Pay annually (48 hours/yr.) for $1346
(save 15%)
Lesson Packages
Seasoned pro or new to golf? Every golfer can benefit from lessons. Our
expert coaches
use cutting-edge
golf technology
to analyze each golfer’s swing and set them up for success. Lesson packages do not expire.
One 30-Min: $50
One 30-minute lesson with an expert coach.
($95/hour)

Take the Next Step
Commit to becoming the golfer you’ve always wanted to be. With our cutting-edge simulators and offers designed for all skill levels, Florida Golf Studio is the perfect place to start.
